# Problem 1

```{r}
shared_birthday = function(n){
  birthdays = sample(1:365, n, replace = TRUE)
  any(duplicated(birthdays))
}

groupsize = 2:50

probabilities = data.frame(
  groupsize = groupsize,
  probability = NA_real_)

for(i in seq_along(groupsize)) {
  n = groupsize [i]
  results = replicate (10000, shared_birthday(n))
  probabilities$probability[i] = mean(results)
}

ggplot(probabilities, aes(x=groupsize, y = probability)) + 
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Probability of Shared Birthday vs Group Size",
       x = "Group Size",
       y = "Probability of at least one shared birthday")
```
